function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Vulnerability as the level of exposure and sensitivity to vbds minus adaptive capacity","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Poverty increases vulnerability to vector-borne diseases vbds by limiting people’s ability to cope with health risks","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Complex interplay of social, cultural, economic, and environmental factors contributes to vulnerability to vbds","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Difficulty in standardizing metrics for measuring vulnerability to vbds across different contexts","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited access to social services and resources","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inequitable health governance and access to diagnosis, treatment, and prevention","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Influence of geography, environment, and culture on health access","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Climate change shifting malarial zones in india","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Effect of economic growth, irrigation, farming, and urbanization on malaria risk","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Impact of development activities on seasonal malaria trends","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of community ownership of natural resources","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Constraints to human agency and social ecology","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate translation of rhetoric into practice","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of emphasis on hygiene and sanitation in community-based adaptation initiatives","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate healthcare access for community members in rural areas","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited communication and coordination between community-based adaptation projects and public health initiatives","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of integrating strong and holistic ecosystem perspectives","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in fostering sustainable transformations in the absence of addressing overarching socio-economic structural conditions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Relative policy neglect for large-scale implementation of participatory approaches","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Unwillingness of mainstream medical establishment to engage with community-based approaches","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Issue of scale in community-based projects","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Unclear scalability of community-based approaches","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Uncertainty about future vector dynamics and disease ecology","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Risk from other vector illnesses if who targets for controlling vbds are not met","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of community-based studies for mitigating the effects of climate change on vbds","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of collaboration between agriculture and health sectors for malaria control","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Difficulty in long-term planning for climate change impact on health in resource-limited settings","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Incentivizing effective adaptation policies in the absence of visible threats","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Uncertainty and ambiguity in epidemiological trends and impact of prevention efforts","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of social science integration in disease control policies and programs","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of integration with policymakers and practitioners","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Focus on single diseases in surveillance systems","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Overlapping transmission of multiple parasitic or viral diseases by the same species of mosquito","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Compartmentalized disease surveillance and reporting systems with fragmented international networks","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited attention to the pervasive co-infection in neglected tropical diseases ntds","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited investigation of potential interactions between people and triatomine bugs in different landscape fragments","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Assumption of homogeneity in social representations and practices of people in geographic, cultural, and economic landscapes","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Validation of results between disciplinary teams suggests potential biases and lack of alternative perspectives","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Failure to consider interactions between distinct pathogens in a common host","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate consideration of climate change projections in describing the risk of multiple vector-borne diseases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Heavy focus on pharmacological interventions and limited attention to environmental management at the community level","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of clean water and sanitation leading to the presence of intestinal parasitic diseases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Neglect of co-infection in disease control and epidemiological structures","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Atypical climatic variations leading to rift valley fever and malaria epidemics in east africa","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Weak community-level outreach systems for public health","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of surveillance and monitoring of disease status at the community level","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of reporting on coinfection and co-morbidity in existing disease distribution systems","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limitations of detail in existing hdss data due to lack of extensive laboratory assessment","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Performance scrutiny and contextual factors influencing community health workers","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"}]}
